content: Lost in this is the simple fact that IT IS NOT HER CHOICE. After 9-11 GWB started REQUIRING by "executive order" the the Speaker of the House, who is third in line be ONLY transported VIA mil air. It was not some kind of "optional thing" Even if she wanted to fly to where ever VIA commericial air or some kind of NETJETS type charter or someones private jet IE lobbyist or who ever either "free" in the case of the private jet, on her own dime or billed to the goverment for the comm air or charter which is how the other 434 members of comgress do it she cannot. You didn't hear all this hew and cry about this when Denny Hastert was speaker. who by the way returned to IL almost every weekend, it is my understanding that Pelosi returns to CA less than once a month. Yes she probably "likes" the "perk" but if she does or not, does it really matter if if fact she does not have a choice?

content: I thought we had a Government with co-equal branches. That the ability to make laws resided in the LEGISLATIVE branch. As Pelosi is a member of the LEGISLATIVE branch, the "Executive" cannot "order" her to do a damned thing! She flies because it feeds her ego. Better than her putting a billion dollar sports stadium as her earmark in some bill or other, isn't it? Sereously, let her downgrade, land at an AFB somewhere to refuel. Do her good to be in a "flyover" state, even if only for a few minutes.
